subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Nets scheduled a workout June 17 for Jay Williams, whom the Chicago Bulls took with the second overall selection in the 2002 draft. Williams played a season with the Bulls but was severely injured in a motorcycle accident in 2003.
snippet: The Nets scheduled a workout June 17 for Jay Williams, whom the Chicago Bulls took with the second overall selection in the 2002 draft. Williams played a season with the Bulls but was severely injured in a motorcycle accident in 2003.
